amendment.description: To require a plan for the enhancement of the operations of the Information Analysis and Infrastructure Protection Directorate.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1379 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1379 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Bayh. (consideration: CR S9870-9871; text: CR S9871) To require a plan for the enhancement of the operations of the Information Analysis and Infrastructure Protection Directorate.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1379 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1379 proposed by Senator Cochran for Senator Bayh.
